contentrichtext.text: '''Blue Ridge''' may refer to any of the following: ==Places== In the United States: *[[Blue Ridge Mountains]], a major range of the Appalachian Mountains **[[Blue Ridge Mountain]] *[[Blue Ridge, Alabama]] *[[Blue Ridge, Georgia]] *[[Blue Ridge, Indiana]] *[[Blue Ridge, Texas]] *[[Blue Ridge, Virginia]] *[[Blue Ridge Summit, Pennsylvania]] *[[Blue Ridge, Seattle]], Washington In Canada: *[[Blue Ridge, Alberta]] ==Other== *[[Blue Ridge Dam]], a hydroelectric dam in Fannin Co., Georgia, USA *[[Blue Ridge High School (disambiguation)]], several high schools in the USA *[[Blue Ridge Parkway]], a road running though the Blue Ridge Mountains *[[Blue Ridge (Amtrak)|''Blue Ridge'' (Amtrak)]], a passenger train *[[USS Blue Ridge|USS ''Blue Ridge'']], several US Navy ships *[[Blue Ridge (album)|''Blue Ridge'' (album)]], a 1985 album featuring Jonathan Edwards and The Seldom Scene *[[Blue Ridge (film)|''Blue Ridge'' (film)]], 2010 film *[[Blue Ridge Capital]], a private equity firm and hedge fund *[[Blue Ridge Communications]], a cable television provider in eastern Pennsylvania *[[Blue Ridge (dishware)]], a type of American dishware manufactured by Southern Potteries, Inc. in the 1930s, 1940s, and 1950s {{disambig|geo}}
